about_SE.title: Meet Bruno, Software Engineer
about_SE.description: Bruno is a passionate software engineer with 5 years of experience, thriving on blending technology and creativity. He specializes in front-end development and has extensive experience working with TypeScript, PHP, and SQL. His dedication to crafting intuitive user experiences drives him to continuously learn and adapt in the fast-paced tech landscape.

about_chef.title: Meet Bruno, Chef
about_chef.description: Outside of coding, Bruno explores his love for cooking, where he combines technical precision with artistic flair. With a specialty in Portuguese and Italian cuisine, he excels in creating flavorful dishes that celebrate rich culinary traditions. His culinary journey reflects the same passion and attention to detail that he brings to software engineering, making each dish a unique and memorable experience.

2.description: Recipes crafted and shared with the community, family, and friends.

showcase.description: Discover a dynamic collection of software engineering projects where creativity meets cutting-edge technology.
